1.content:
The sun shined in the orange sky. The thick infinite tropical forest echoed with life and the unknown. It was morning on planet XX-YZ2Y. It was calm and peaceful in till an unusual sound broke the morning chorus. A Spacecraft shot out from the clouds toward the surface. The plane-like Spacecraft circled the jungle a couple of times looking for a spot to set down. It located a clearing surrounded by a few trees. It landed down, its engines wining as it descended toward the ground. Landing gear popped out of the bottom of the craft setting itself gently down of the surface of the planet. After a long pause a ramp lowered from the bottom of the craft. Group of soldiers dressed in armored space-suits exited the ship. They carried an assortment of weapons and explosives. They walked onto the wet ground stomping through puddles. They all looked around studying the environment. Kenny Dale let out a deep breath. “Whelp, this already sucks. Why are we here again?”
Tommy Landis turned to Kenny. “Search and rescue remember.”
“Right Search and rescue in what General Lutz calls the space Bermuda triangle, yeah we’re going to find something here.”
“Hey we just might.” Lonnie Williams said. “Remember Carlos, He was lost on Mars for weeks. We found him.”
“Mars is like our freakin backyard; this is an uncharted area of space. From what Lutz explained ships have been disappearing in this sector for years, and now were here on death planet woohoo for us.”
“Dammit Dale, can you stop complaining for five minutes!” Jack Foley, a young black haired man, yelled across the clearing at Dale. “We’re here to find a friend. A close friend, a friend that has been missing for a year away from his family and his home, and the more you complain the less chance any of us have of going back.” He was in front of Kenny now. “So if you don’t mind could you shut the hell up and get moving?”
They’re eyes locked on each other for a while when finally Kenny let out a deep breath and nodded. “Whatever you say chief.” Kenny Spurted.
He walked off. Jack had known Steven almost all his life. After word got out that he was missing Jack was the first to volunteer for a rescue mission. He was very brave and loyal to his friends. He turned to the rest of the group.
“Listen up! We have our orders from Sargent Leo to search the perimeter while the rest of the men on the ship set up camp. From then on it’s a full search and rescue for Cole. So let’s gear up and get moving people.”
The rest of the group nodded their heads in agreement, grabbed their equipment and started walking into the thick brush of the forest. Larry roués ran up to Jack. “Funny, you were always the quiet type.”
Jack nodded. “This is a friend we’re looking for and I have no time guy’s screwing around.”
Larry smiled. “Yes sir.”
They began their trek.
1.title: Landing

choices: The group is attacked on the way.
11.content:
he group had been walking for at least two hours. They had gotten out of the denser parts of the forest. The group was now in a swamp like part of the jungle. The dirty water was up to their knees while different kinds of marshes and plants peeked out of the water. Kenny took a seat on a downed tree. He let out a sigh. “Oh man,” He looked over to Larry who was doing some calculations on his wrist computer. “Hey Larry would you advise taking off your helmet?”
“No, most of the air seems breathable but there’s a certain particle in the air that I’ve never seen before, could be dangerous.” He responded.
“So then that’s a no?”
“Yes that’s a no.”
“Great.” Kenny said rolling his eyes.
“Kenny, Larry let’s get a move on.” Jack yelled back.
“Jack! Jack!” Lonnie screamed. He was running through the swamp creating waves.
“Jack, you need see this.” Lonnie said out of breath.
Lonnie led the group as they ran across the swamp. Tommy was standing next to a metallic object pointing out of the waters. It was a wing, a spaceship wing.
“That that must be a part of Cole’s wreckage.” Kenny said.
“Yeah must be. He must have flown over head of hear before crashing. We can’t be far from the crash site.” Tommy said.
“Nope, Not at all.” Larry said staring across the swamp. There was a large pit surrounded by downed trees across the swamp. Little pieces of debris were scattered across the pit.
The group walked over to it.
“You think that’s the crash site?” Kenny said to Jack.
“Might be, Looks the part.” Jack replied.
“Well then where the hell is ship.”
Kenny was right. “Larry scan the area.”
Larry raised his right arm. A chorus of red beams shot out of his wrist scanning every part of the area. He looked down at his wrist computer.
“All scans seem correct. There was a ship here once.”
“What about Steve?” Jack asked.
“There to have been some type of activity here. The scan is showing bare foot prints on the marsh. Feminine, Bi-pedal, more than one. Something someone was here and a lot of them.”
“So you’re saying something moved this ship?” Kenny asked.
“Possibly.” Larry replied.
There was movement in the trees. All the men went for their weapons. Something was watching them.
“Alright we’re heading back.” Jack radioed the ship. “Sargent Leo this Foley, My men and I have found Steven Cole’s wreckage. No he’s not here but we are not alone on this rock. Yes. Yes we’re heading back now Foley out.”
Jack turned to the rest of the men. “We’re heading out now!”
They started running out of the swamp.
11.title: Wreckage found

111.content:
The group sprinted toward base. The ship was now surrounded by other soldiers, weapons carts, and turrets. As the group entered the camp Sargent Leo walked up to them.
“Foley.”
“Sargent.”
“There’s something else out there Sargent.” Kenny said.
“Are you sure? Your report has everyone going crazy around here.” The Sargent asked.
“Yeah Larry tell him.” Kenny said.
“I picked up some readings on my scanner. There was other being by the wreckage it had to be.”
“Good job boys. Get back in the ship and wash-.” The Sargent paused. Lonnie was standing completely still with a blank look on his face, almost a dead confusing look.
“Williams, you okay?” The Sargent asked.
Lonnie’s body jolted as he spat up blood. He fell to the ground face first. The entire unit held their breath. Lonnie had two long wooden arrows in his back.
“WHAT THE FU-“Kenny shouted.
There was an explosion; towering beings began jumping out of the jungles. The turrets began to spin firing. The explosion caused smoke to shower the area around the ship. Sounds of gunfire, arrows, and odd shouts of gibberish filled the air.
“What hells going on?!” Kenny shouted.
“Don’t know I- what the?!”
The smoke began to clear and the identities off their attackers became clearer. 7 ft. women in loin cloths were attacking the men. They were armed with an assortment of different weapons including spears and swords. The women were beautiful, sexy vixens golden skin complexions. They were killing the men in droves with no remorse. Jack grabbed his gun and began to fire at the assailant’s so did the rest of the men.
“Who they hell are they?!” Tommy yelled.
“How the hell am I supposed to know?” Larry yelled back firing his machine-gun.
“These guys- I mean girls are fast!” Kenny yelled.
“Just keep shooting dammit!” Jack commanded.
The women were destroying the turrets and weapon depots. The men didn’t stand much of a chance. The women were formable and organized. They had troops up in the trees firing arrows while ground forces fought the men off. One off the women grabbed Jack and threw him far across the base perimeter. They knocked out the Sargent and Larry. Kenny dropped his gun surrendering. Tommy killed off a few more of them before being picked up and violently thrown into the ground. Jack got up firing a few more rounds when suddenly there was an immense explosion in front of him. He was blown into the thick brush. He tumbled down a hill coming to a violent stop in a wet marsh. He got up groaning and grabbed his gun. He heard a large splash. He quickly turned around arming his gun and opened fire. One of the women had followed him down the hill. She had long black hair and cute but menacing face. She was covered in blue tattooed symbols and wore a toothed necklace around her neck probably from an animal she had killed. She was holding two wicked looking broad swords. She started at Jack. Jack held his weapon up and unleashed an array of bullets. She used to her bullets to block most of the fire. She lunged one of her swords at him. He barrel rolled out of the way taking out his side arm. He continued to evade her. She shouted out more gibberish probably their native language. He took an impulse grenade from his belt and threw it at her without pulling the pin. He turned in a spilt second and fired a bullet at the grenade. It blew right in front of her blowing her back into a tree hard. She slumped to the ground knocked out and defeated. Jack got up and walked toward her reloading his weapon. He studied her, his weapon trained on her. She looked peaceful.
“Man,” Jack said. “Aren’t you a sight for sore eyes?”
Jack then saw something that made his eyes widen like a deer in head lights. On her neck was a tattoo of Dog tag numbers 577-085. Jack couldn’t believe it.
“Steve?”
111.title: Ambushed

1111.content:
Sargent Leo awoke dazed. He was in excruciating pain. He looked around his surroundings, he was in some kind of wooden house house. He looked to his left. His men were tied up against the wall in some kind purple rope. He looked down at his chest discovering he was to.
"Sir, Sir are you alright?" someone asked.
The Sargent looked over, it was Tommy, he was in the middle of the row.
"Landis that you?" The Sargent asked.
"Yes sir. You alright?" He asked.
"Is alright none of us are alright! We're all dead!" Kenny let out.
"Dale? What the hell happened Landis, where are we?" The Sargent asked.
"They ambushed us sir, fast and hard. They took what was left of us here." Tommy explained.
"Where is here?" The Sargent asked.
"Some kind of small village. Must be there base, There are a lot of hostels sir."
The Sargent looked over again, he only counted twelve soldiers. "This can't be all of us." He said.
"It's not," Tommy said. "They took the other half of survivors to a different side of the camp."
The was a creak at the entrance to the house. The door slowly opened as two armored women holding spears entered the room and stood at attention. A third women entered the room. She was a tall beautiful red head, Bella. She studied the men with a smile. Her eyes scanned each one of their faces looking for weakness and fear. She was stumped when her eyes came to Sargent Leo's face, his expression mean and twisted, his eyes frozen over with rage. He showed her no fear. Bella gave a wave of her hand at the other two women. They nodded and quickly left the hut closing the door shut. Bella waited a while making sure no one else came. She looked back down at the Sargent.
"So, your the leader yes?" She said.
Sargent Leo's angry expression changed to that of amazement. "You speak English?" He asked.
"Yes, I actually speak many earthly languages, but that's not the point." She said.
"Who are you?" Tommy commanded. "Why are you keeping us here?!"
"Silence your tongue! You were not permitted to speak!!" Bella yelled.
"Yeah he is you crazy bitch now answer his question!" Sargent Leo said backing Tommy up.
Bella smiled. "No need for name calling Leo."
Bella paced around the room slowly swaying her hips. "As much as I would want to answer your question I have a more pressing concern."
Bella took a black disc out of her loin cloth. She held it in her palm as a hologram appeared from the surface. The hologram was of the woman who attacked Jack during the ambush. She held it up to The Sargent's face, the blue light reflected off his helmet.
"Have you seen this woman?" Bella asked.
"Lost one of your stray dogs?" The Sargent replied.
Bella ignored him and passed the hologram down in front of all of the men's faces. "Have any of you seen this woman?" She said going down the row. "It would be to your benefit to answer." She was now in front of Kenny. She held the Hologram in front of his helmet. "Seen her?" Bella asked.
Kenny looked through the hologram at Bella's nearly exposed breast's.
"No but baby I wanna be seeing more of you!" He yelped.
Bella rolled her eyes and started walking away. "Nice ass!" Kenny whispered.
Bella hearing the comment started back toward Kenny she keeled down in front of him, she grabbed one of her breast.
"You like that don't you," She said sweetly. "You like em big don't you."
"Yeah baby I like em big!" Kenny said mesmerized by Bella's Breast when suddenly Bella reached over and tore off Kenny's helmet. He choked on the gas like air as Bella ripping his suit apart revealing his bare chest.
"Well hopefully you get a pair of em." She walked off as Kenny continued to cough. Bella turned to the rest of the solders. "If you want to stay alive, if you want to leave this planet alive you will stay here and remain quiet! Any attempt's at escape or struggle will result in death. Or you'll end up like Kenny over there."
Bella started for the door. "You never answered my question." Sargent Leo said.
Bella turned toward him. "Bait."
Bella exited the hut slamming the door shut.
1111.title: Taken to the leader

11111.content:
The sun had set and night had cast its shadow over the land. Jack sat on a tree stump in a small clearing. He had set a small fire which separated him and the female warrior that attacked him earlier. Jack had tied her up against a tree. Jack studied her features pondering. She looked so peaceful while she slept. Her face calm and warm, her lips almost formed something of a smile. Her body was lean and outlined with sexy curves. She was beautiful, perfect almost but who she is was a problem. Jack sighed in disbelief. “Is that really you Steve?” He whispered to himself. “What the hell did they do to you buddy?”
Just as Jack finished those words the warrior jolted awake. She looked about slowly confused and disoriented. She caught sight of Jack and let out a howl of anger. Jack gripped his side arm. The warrior struggled to get free of her bonds but could not, she spat out gibberish as she squirmed to be free.
“Those vines are really something aren’t they?” Jack said to the warrior. “Knew they’d hold ya, well I prayed they’d hold ya.”
The warrior faced Jack with an expression of disgust. “Fig umnny Ai Ly kay.” she said before she raised her head to the sky and howled.
Jack snickered within his helmet at the oddness of the warrior. “Uh if you’re calling for help you’re not going to get it. I we’re a long ways from my base camp and I’m guessing yours.”
The warrior kept on howling not understanding a word Jack was saying. Jack his helmet and paced around a bit. He looked back at the warrior. “Steve?” He said blankly.
“Steven Cole, ring any bells?” The warrior kept howling. It was almost as if she wasn’t running out of air. “HEY!!” Jack took out his side arm and trained it on the warrior. Her howling stopped abruptly as she lowered her head. Her eyes met the barrel of the pistol then drifted up toward Jack’s.
“Fig jah loc num-“
“Stop with the fucking gibberish, please!” Jack yelled cutting her off. The warrior fell silent her attention devoted to Jack.
“Steve, Steve Cole. Do, do you know what that is?” Jack said.
The warrior stared at him blank faced. Jack gestured toward himself. “Jack, Jack Foley? Best friends sense high school introduced you to Mary…MARY!” Jack unzipped a pocket on his suit. He pulled out a small silver square plate. He tapped it and a holographic image appeared. Two men, a woman, and a child (probably around 5) sat at a kitchen table. They were young and happy. Jack showed the warrior the picture.
“Steve, hey Look remember this? It’s me, you, Mary, Timmy. Your wife your son?”
The warrior looked at the picture in horror. She turned her head away closing her eyes.
“NIO, NIO!!” She repeated shaking her head.
“You remember don’t you? But something’s telling you not to. Steve remember, remember your family, your friends. Remember.”
The warrior raised her head and shouted. “NIOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO”
The warrior passed out. Jack dropped the gun and fell to the warrior’s side. “Steve, Steve buddy are you alright? STEVE!”
The warrior raised her head. “What…..what’s going….” She turned her head to face Jack. “Jack? Jack Foley is that…..is that you.”
Jack smiled speechless. STEVE looked around confused. “Why am I tied to a tree?”
Jack laughed. “I think the real question is why you are seven feet tall with boobs.”
Steve looked down at his chest. “That is a good question.”
11111.title: Bringing Steve back.

info.brief_description: the hunt for the astronaut Steve Colbert is on in this new sequel to Crash Landing.
info.description:
This is a sequel to Crash Landing. it takes place about a year after the events of the first. Astronauts are sent to the planet to find out just what happened to Steve. This is a military team so there are guns and a lot more action in this one. They also discover a plot that could effect our planet.
The main character in this one is Jack McCoy. He is an old friend of Steve's.
There is a main story to follow but this is still a tg transformation story so I'll try to create as many extra chapters as I can.
you can change the characters as you want just make sure there's a story in there somewhere.

Hope you enjoy and please comment and leave reviews. Thanks.
